column21: Correct format for Alexa Bartender App.

column23: I love this app. I have been able to find almost every drink that I have asked for.

column5: I really wish I could interact with it online, and put in an inventory of the ingredients I have. Then the app could only give me recipes I have ingredients for, or even make recommendations on what I should buy to increase the number of drinks I can make
Wished that that it would add to indgrentants to the shopping list.

column6: needs better fuzzy matching on the developer's server side.
column16: needs better fuzzy matching on the developer's server side.

column5: Tells you what's in the drink and how to make it, but doesn't give amounts
The Bartender is capable of listing out the ingredients for many common drinks but has a limited library.

column13: Love the idea of asking what and how to make a 'cocktail' with what you have on hand.

column16: She didn't understand what I was saying.

column5: It would be better if it returned more than one cocktail.
column18: Didn't understand the first three drinks I tried.

column6: I had a lot of trouble trying to get the Long Island iced tea recipe.
